mapper.select: SELECT A.SALEDATE, D.STORENAME, A.AMT CURRAMT, B.AMT COMAMT,A.AMT-B.AMT COMINCREASE ,A.SUMAMT CURRSUM, C.SUMAMT HISSUM FROM REPORT_STOREDAYSALE A, REPORT_STOREDAYSALE B, REPORT_STOREDAYSALE C, REPORT_STOREINFO D, REPORT_COMDAY E WHERE A.STORECODE = D.STORECODE AND B.STORECODE = D.STORECODE AND C.STORECODE = D.STORECODE AND A.SALEDATE = #{SALEDATE} AND A.SALEDATE = E.CURRENTDATE AND B.SALEDATE = E.COMPAREDATE AND C.SALEDATE = ADD_MONTHS(#{SALEDATE}, -12) ORDER BY D.STORESEQ
select * from REPORT_STOREDAYSALE where AMT = #{AMT} and SALEDATE = #{SALEDATE}
